name: pgCodeKeeper 6.5.1
body:
* fixed NPE in UserMapping when privileges are ignored 8c37e035e61d7ee8d7c3808487b524ea8648a350
* restored no-filter state in SQL Editor's DB store picker c348ae2d78b82147f11332332b78d75884f03c0a

name: pgCodeKeeper 6.4.1
body: * fixed foreign and other options taking only identifiers 836f0acb10e16c9eb3d16a8d3fa660be713afdfc

name: pgCodeKeeper 6.3.3
body: * fixed data loss in data migration when column type or attributes change f3fe707d9680bd5b59c6439c8e9280e60a1a7a21

name: pgCodeKeeper 6.3.1
body: * fixed reading SQL-standard function bodies via JDBC bed37175e6e23e005174d7bca6b6c27cd2bc7a35

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.11.3
body: * fixed duplicate object error when using pg_dbo_timestamp extension 0ea081466a1b026e83e15043640be1fc6e00cd71

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.9.14
body:
* fixed extension CASTs being loaded 4165ba455eb80c541ed4a2eb182dc115380453a7
* fixed DB toolbar combo content when switching editors 80bfbff095243747d25224920583c3896b5d70d7

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.9.7
body:
fixed pgcodekeeper-cli.bat for cases when there are special characters in arguments a6c417d
fixed CTE analysis af64fb1

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.9.3
body: * fixed EXPLAIN as RETURN QUERY variant 48f5cb848e28e203b667216be850b7dafb4dec50

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.8.3
body:
* fixed compatibility with PostgreSQL 12 9de39f27e848ff5d37d0ea70e62e8dd5fbc15771
* fixed error reporting for libraries attached to pgCodeKeeper projects
fixed error reporting for projects loaded in CLI
fixed parsing errors when encountering `LIST` identifier 
50a4b13daec35a5325e18c5be14d0186d60df283
* fixed charset of Diff Wizard generated scripts 46d91dc8c8b8e0a5caf4516450002c44a3353488
* fixed NPE when analyzing object with no location (i.e. JDBC) a4c0044ac94ce1c959d38a1058d9ce2a9f064509

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.8.2
body:
* fixed NPE when opening Diff Wizard's resulting script dc0a3e7b391e46de2d96ee227dc3d1234feeea6c
* changed query result clipboard copy to be compatible with both SQL and CSV (copying as SQL strings) b7da8e8fdd19a4f015765a7281ac2058d1b8b9c8
* l10n fixes

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.5.3
body:
* fixed function call dependency resolution when argument type has typmod 305bbc1d8ad7fdc0568d99f8904f54340caa099a
* fixed an error when opening an SQL file outside of an Eclipse project 3443a558e5e86199319c7d577352c64bbe44d867

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.4.5
body:
* Feature Preview: running SELECTs and other returning queries from SQL Editor 65a6cb4c6f57ec6cdf12aa48412ad72128e59d13
* fixed incorrect INDEX creation for partitioned tables 79ce064cc8d32a4eb30f5e9fb923848a47c15f4b
* fixed IgnoreList UI label d32fa05e1e6ac2174cbdea73349e5b6d604a22b6

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.4.3
body:
* added support for leading GO commands in T-SQL parser, introduced in v5.4.0 a98c01ac92896e06175d9ac397c28c12e40da98f
* added support for no trailing semicolon in SQL parser, improved handling of semicolons

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.4.2
body: * fixed tablespaces being read for FOREIGN KEYS as well as primaries d75464755e18c392928f3b3e86777c3c4d6f45c4

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.3.8
body:
* fixed changes in function default args not affecting its dependent objects while generating migration scripts a40de48b9f24fc4a1f0ad57b4f2cd65c97e3b5b4
* added parser support for empty SQL statements e39876edfd571655353c9592398be169919a638c

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.3.7
body:
* fixed Console pages leak 366410544941ee391e83d3477bc98c1fbf69c3eb
* fixed MS SQL builder failing with parallel parser launches 1fc31b091a85d82391382db277e6e6d11db6a367
* fixed potential NPEs when executing scripts with bad SQL 114abcc5d7e1171bcb9778dc46eb9eed0f64a353

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.3.3
body:
Hotfix:
* fixed unsupported special function call syntaxes in MS SQL 4dbda2b3d428a03bcca685f191f86cd8413bd521
* fixed mismatched source/target library XML options in CLI 534f6c1e11f8ce63376f88e87211db8364ebec59
* fixed lost operation cancellation checks in JDBC 58d158d036367bc15e2c4742f230cf681f1f3703

body:
Hotfix:

body:

* fixed REVOKE PUBLIC privilege being ignored for FUNCTIONs and TYPEs 0478352601f913b7f2d363f47065e64fd32267ea
* misc fixes be1a488429765dab0a0a7efd0d41e25dcf5eb522...432fbf49d895d2f43017cc5430a69f9afe06d498

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.1.7
body:
Hotfix:
* do not read extension operators

body:
Hotfix:
* a number of MS SQL support bugfixes, see commits a3d7c68d11adf1300ef21783a6494ba98edd248f...e28addfc8b4134bf8eefc639ec5c41508235749a

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.1.3
body:
Hotfix:
* a number of MS SQL support bugfixes, see commits be1769db5c23e8c3f3959b2520163c233da6ed28...b9c07ed2a7c392f433fa1e28c0bab9c14c6a6b77

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.1.2
body:
Hotfix:
* fixed quotation of procedure parameters' default values in MSSQL (ae3c072d45fbfa4cd9e474188105cdfb9108b9e7)

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.1.0
body: MS SQL support: limited test version. CLI and GUI.

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.0.2
body:
Hotfix:
* fixed user types qualification in JDBC loader (28d3b5f7a92d9719d87d8f02d61dcd718947c7fb)

name: pgCodeKeeper 5.0.1
body:
Hotfix:
* fixed JDBC NPE when reading table descendant objects (5e62a1a6b8ea3de3d321e5abfafcbe0b4cde43b5)
* fixed JDBC NPE when reading IDENTITY sequences (d0a70f430c823660bf5dd6e2d69270ce2aff41a1)
* l10n fix (9077cf39501495cd780cdc44a6a936a5455b0dfe)

name: pgCodeKeeper 4.6.1
body:
Hotfix:
* fixed parsing of nameless function parameter of type `character varying` (f0f50aea)
* fixed compatibility with Eclipse 4.8 (8b8ba4b6)
* fixed decrementing SEQUENCEs to comply with PostgreSQL 10 implementation (badf9cf1)
* fixed CONSTRAINT processing when working with `pg_dbo_timestamp` extension (f05bbacc)
* misc fixes (04e0f4fd, 66722355, d88875b5)

name: pgCodeKeeper 4.5.2
body:
Hotifx:
- fixed editor association with SQL files
- fixed JDBC failover failing when server helper function forces transaction into an error state

name: pgCodeKeeper 4.3.2
body: Fixed serial SEQUENCEs being converted into IDENTITY clauses on PostgreSQL 10.

name: pgCodeKeeper 4.3.1
body: Fix: Removed a false positive suggestion attach the pgCodeKeeper project builder to projects not related to pgCodeKeeper.
